label: cascading_failure_01_ep_012
content:

### Connection Pools

- replica: active 54 | idle 46 | waiting 0 | exhaustion: 0 | max: 100 | avg_wait: 1ms
- third_party_geo: active 48 | idle 12 | waiting 6 | exhaustion: 1 | max: 60 | avg_wait: 18ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 93.6% | Bandwidth: 6.9 Gbps | Origin requests: 345800

### Alerts
- [WARNING] SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT on service-b-01: retry_count=132 retry_rate_pct=0.11
- [WARNING] CONNPOOL-WAIT on gateway-02: pool=third_party_geo waiting=6 avg_wait_ms=18

### Deployments & Changes
- Deployed gateway observability pack v0.9.2

### Events
- Enabled extra upstream timing fields in gateway logs
- A/B test 'checkout-v2' at 15% rollout
- Scaled service-B from 6 to 7 instances
- CDN cache hit rate 93.6%

### On-Call
- Shift: K. Okafor. 2 pages (CONNPOOL-WAIT, SERVICE-B-RETRY-COUNT). 1 ticket (OBS-210 log fields). Status: Monitoring.
